name: DCH Blood Spot Outcome CF SnCT
description: A code from the SNOMED Clinical Terminology UK coding system that describes the outcome of the blood spot screening for cystic fibrosis.
copyright: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright Â© 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

concept.display: Newborn blood spot specimen received
Cystic fibrosis screening declined (situation)
Cystic fibrosis screening declined, no history of being screened
Cystic fibrosis screening declined, screened in UK (as reported by parents) with no evidence of result
Cystic fibrosis screening declined, screened outside UK with evidence of result
Cystic fibrosis screening declined, screened outside UK with no evidence of result
Newborn blood spot screening programme, cystic fibrosis repeat screening with further sample required
Cystic fibrosis screening, too young for reliable screening
Cystic fibrosis screening,sample taken too soon after blood transfusion (less than 72 hours)
Cystic fibrosis screening, insufficient sample
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): incorrect blood application
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample (blood quality): compressed/damaged
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: day 0 and day 5 on same card
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: possible faecal contamination
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: NHS number missing/not accurately recorded
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: date of sample missing/not accurately recorded
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: date of birth not accurately matched
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: expired card used
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: more than 14 days in transit, too old for analysis
Cystic fibrosis screening, unsuitable sample: damaged in transit
Cystic fibrosis screening, inconclusive result
Cystic fibrosis not suspected
Carrier of cystic fibrosis gene mutation
Newborn blood spot screening programme, cystic fibrosis not suspected and other disorders follow up required
Suspected cystic fibrosis
Newborn blood spot screening programme, cystic fibrosis not screened for or screening incomplete
Cystic fibrosis not screened for or screening incomplete: more than 8 weeks, too old for screening
Cystic fibrosis not screened for or screening incomplete, moved out of area (finding)
Cystic fibrosis not screened for or screening incomplete, not contactable, reasonable efforts made (finding)
Cystic fibrosis not screened for or screening incomplete, baby died (finding)
Cystic fibrosis not screened for or screening incomplete, not required, previous valid result (finding)
